definition: you might as well (do it)/simply/just
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
exploratory

sentences.english: This paper tries to explore the application of fine powder technology to Chinese medicinal herbs and insoluble medicines.
sentences.chinese: 本文就難溶藥物與中草藥微細化技術作出探索性研究。

sentences.english: Chen is full of sweat with heat so that he has to untie the buttons of blue shirt.
sentences.chinese: 陳老師熱得滿頭大汗，索性將藍色襯衣的扣子解開。

sentences.english: Exploratory testing, on the other hand, can be more ad hoc.
sentences.chinese: 從另一方面來說，探索性測試可能更加特殊。

sentences.english: Under the hot sun, the student in the middle resorts to a light-colored wig to block the sun.
sentences.chinese: 烈日當空，走在中間的學生，索性帶頂淺色假髮遮陽。

sentences.english: She got a bump on the head when she fell off her bicycle, but thankfully she wasn't hurt.
sentences.chinese: 她從自行車上摔下來時頭被撞了一下，索性沒有受傷。

sentences.english: The performance of the prototype adopting PPN electronic injection system has been trial-tested.
sentences.chinese: 對採用PPN電噴系統的樣機性能進行了探索性試驗。

sentences.english: Would I just as well forget about them altogether?
sentences.chinese: 我會索性將它們全部忘掉嗎？

sentences.english: Especially if you do not choose Exploratory Testing.
sentences.chinese: 特別是如果你不知道選擇探索性測試的話。

sentences.english: Since he had made the blasphemy he did not apologize.
sentences.chinese: 既然已經罵開了，他索性也不道歉。

sentences.english: Christmas Day is Thursday; the British people a week are simply called Christmas week.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕日是個星期四，英國人索性將一週都封爲聖誕周。

sentences.english: Secondly, on basis of exploring experiment, do the normal experiment to select the chemical composition.
sentences.chinese: 第二步是在探索性實驗基礎上做正交實驗，優選配方。

sentences.english: He keeps telling quiting, at last they dismiss him from his job simply.
sentences.chinese: 他總是說要辭職不幹，最後他們索性請他真的辭職。

sentences.english: Now we just ignore them and try to promote other activities.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們索性不管它們，而是嘗試推廣其他活動。

sentences.english: Thirdly , to put forward the development counter measure of Shandong higher vocational education explorative .
sentences.chinese: 探索性地提出了對山東省高等職業教育的發展對策。

sentences.english: Many signboards of here are in bilingual, some are even only in Russian.
sentences.chinese: 很多商店的招牌都是中俄雙語，有的索性只有俄語。

definition: straightforward/clear-cut/blunt (e.g. statement)/you might as well/simply
without any better option/to have to/to be forced to
to drop (subject etc)
to have no alternative but to/to be obliged to
let it be/let it pass/forget about it
to avoid/so as to save (money or time)
therefore
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
not to feel like (doing sth)/disinclined to
(dialect) oneself/by oneself
to consider past cause and future effect (idiom); to think over the past and future/to ponder over reasons and connection
so as not to/so as to avoid
unexpectedly
there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
life or death/fate/no matter what/anyway/for the life of me
since/as/this being the case
